site_name: Avery Hill Campus, Avery Hill Road, Eltham, London, SE9 2UG
description: Certificate of Lawfulness (Proposed) for The relocation of an access ramp and doorway to provide centralised student services to the Aragon Building. The provision of ramped access to an existing office at 19-20 Aragon Court. The provision of refuse and recycling facilities close to the David Fussey Building. The provision of composting bays on the campus.
